objectives.description: 3 points if Astrochimp Escapes

subObjectives.description: +2 points if in Possession of Briefcase
+2 point if in Possession of Artifact
+2 points if in Possession of a Gun

characters.name: Billionaire
gamePlayQuirks: Fletcher is and item that can be Picked Up, Dropped, Thrown etc.
Fletcher cannot be Attacked or Downed but can be annihilated (has a helmet)
Starts with 3 grey Bribes

agenda.name: Survive

objectives.description: 4 points if Billionaire Escapes

subObjectives.description: +1 point if not Colocated with Live Humans or Robots at Stationfall.

objectives.description: 2 points if Fletcher Escapes

subObjectives.description: +1 point if Fletcher and Billionaire are Colocated when Escaping.

ScoringQuirks: Billionaire doesn't score any Possessed or unused Bribes

characters.name: Boarder
gamePlayQuirks: Boarder starts with a bludgeon, gun and helmet on her Character card

agenda.name: Loot

objectives.description: 2 points if Boarder Escapes

subObjectives.description: +4 points if Boarder in Possession of Briefcase or if Briefcase is in Outer Space at Stationfall.
+1 point for ever Live Human in Outer Space at Stationfall

ScoringQuirks: Boarder can win even if Guilty
Boarder scores double for Possessed Bribes

characters.name: Botanist
gamePlayQuirks: Fang moss is an Item. Any Character Possessing Fang Moss gets access to the Feed Me! Action.

objectives.description: 2 points for every Human Annihilated by Fang Moss
2 points if Fang Moss Escapes
2 points if Botanist Escapes

subObjectives.description: +1 point if Contaminated.

characters.name: Colonel
gamePlayQuirks: Colonel can not be Bribed.
Starts with a Gun.

objectives.description: 3 points if Colonel Escapes
2 points if at least one Contaminated NPC Escapes.
2 points if Project X is released.
2 points if the X-Secret Escapes.

characters.name: Consort
gamePlayQuirks: Despite Appearances, Consort is a Robot

agenda.name: New Life

objectives.description: 0 points if Consort Escapes

subObjectives.description: +3 points if not Colocated with Live Human or Robot at Stationfall
+3 points if Possess Briefcase
+1 point if Secret Identity not Revealed until Stationfall

ScoringQuirks: Consort scores double for Possessed Bribes

characters.name: Corpsicle
gamePlayQuirks: Starts Down
Has an integral Helmet (Cannot be removed)

objectives.description: 3 points if Corpsicle Escapes

subObjectives.description: +2 points if Possess Nanogel

objectives.description: 2 points if X-Secret Escapes
2 points if Project X is not released
2 points if Counselor Escapes
4 points if the Artifact Escapes
2 points if you have more Kompromat thant any other player at Stationfall
1 point if you have the least Cubes in Betrayal Box at Stationfall

characters.name: Cyborg
gamePlayQuirks: Act as Human in the case of Hazards and Attacks

agenda.name: Revenge

objectives.description: 1 point for each Character with Officer that is Down at Stationfall
2 points if no Human PCs Escape
2 points if no Contamination Escapes
2 points if Project X was released.

ScoringQuirks: Cyborg can win even if Guilty

characters.name: Daredevil
gamePlayQuirks: X

agenda.name: Thrillseeker

objectives.description: 3 points if Daredevil Escapes

subObjectives.description: +2 points if you are the only Human that Escapes
+2 points if Possess Aftifact or are Contaminated

objectives.description: 1 point if Project X was released

ScoringQuirks: With Point Break ability Daredevil only needs to Possess ad Helmet and by Colocated with Rocket Wings at Stationfall to Escape, she doesn't need to Possess Rocket Wings.
Even if Daredevil can be in Outer Space without Helmet she still needs a Helmet to take the Rocket Wings Launch action.

characters.name: Digital Assistant
gamePlayQuirks: Digital Assistant is Data, and cannot Possess Items or Data
Digital Assistant can be Manufactured in Mainframe
Blackout prevents Digital Assistant from doing Console Actions
Digital Assistan can only perform Console Actions, even when no Character Manufactured you yet.

objectives.description: 2 points for every Escaped Robot that Possesses Digital Assistant
1 point for every Offsite or Escaped Human that Possesses Digital Assistant
2 points if at least two copies of Digital Assistant Escape

characters.name: Doctor (Hyde)
gamePlayQuirks: Doctor has 2 Identity Cards. Each Identity card has its own Agenda.

Doctor may be the PC of two players. A player trying to Bribe or use Kompromat on such a PC must choose one of the two players to accept or refuse. Both players become suspect if Kompromat is refused.

agenda.name: X

objectives.description: X

subObjectives.description: X
X
X

ScoringQuirks: Hyde scores double for Bribes Possessed by Doctor

characters.name: Doctor (Jekyll)
gamePlayQuirks: Doctor has 2 Identity Cards. Each Identity card has its own Agenda.

Doctor may be the PC of two players. A player trying to Bribe or use Kompromat on such a PC must choose one of the two players to accept or refuse. Both players become suspect if Kompromat is refused.

agenda.name: Science

objectives.description: 1 point if Doctor Escapes

subObjectives.description: +3 points if Contaminated
+3 points if Possess Artifact

objectives.description: 3 points if News and Authorities do not have Evidence at Stationfall

ScoringQuirks: Jekyll scores normally for any Bribes Possessed by Doctor

characters.name: Drones
gamePlayQuirks: Drones have no identity cards
Drones are never activated and therefore can never Free Pick Up or Drop.
Drones can perform Action and may Possess Items and Date
Both Drones possess internal Bludgeons
Using console Action Remote Control is the only way to act with Drones. Unless Digital Assistant is in the game.

agenda.name: None

objectives.description: Drones have no agenda.

ScoringQuirks: Drones have no identity cards, and thus can not be anybody's PC or BC

characters.name: Engineer
gamePlayQuirks: If an unlaunched Pod is targeted by Overload and then launches before Time marker resolves, the Pod is Annihilated when the Time marker resolves

objectives.description: 3 points if Antimatter detonates On Board before Stationfall
3 points if no Contaminated Characters Escape
2 points if Artifact does not Escape
1 point if Innocent, but may win even if Guilty.
2 points if Exile Escapes

subObjectives.description: +2 points for each Possessed Kompromat of Escaped Characters
+3 points if Exile has Evidence and News (offsite) does not.

characters.name: Inspector
gamePlayQuirks: Inspector shuttle can be launched if Inspector is present. (or with Jury Rig)

agenda.name: Dirty

objectives.description: 2 points if Inspector Escapes

subObjectives.description: +4 points if Possess Briefcase

objectives.description: 1 point if Authorities (offsite) end with the Evidence.

subObjectives.description: +2 points if News (offsite) does not.

ScoringQuirks: Inspector Scores double for Possessed Bribes

characters.name: Legal
gamePlayQuirks: NDA is Data. Legal does not possess NDA, but can Manufacture it into the Possession of Colocated Characters.
Characters Possessing NDA may not Copy, Delete, Deliver, or be Robbed of Data.
Legal may manufacture NDA into Downed Character's Possession.

objectives.description: 1 point for each Human that Escapes with NDA
4 points if no Humans Escape or all Escaped Humans have NDA
2 points if the Evidence does not Escape
1 point for each Suspect (Not Guilty) PC Stationfall

characters.name: Maintenance Clones
gamePlayQuirks: 3 characters on board: alpha, beta and gamma
When activating perform Actions with a single Clone per turn.
Each clone has a Item limit of 2
Each clone can Possess it own Data types and does not automatically share it with other Clones.
Can still be activated and Renegotiated as long as at least one of them has not Escaped or been Annihilated.

objectives.description: 1 point if a Clone Escapes

subObjectives.description: +4 points if at least two Clones Escape
+2 points if News ends with Evidence

characters.name: Medical
gamePlayQuirks: Free steps from Emergency Response ability can be chained together.
Can not revive Unhelmeted Humans in Hazards.

agenda.name: Be Really Useful

objectives.description: 2 point if no Down Humans On Board at Stationfall
1 points for each star reached on the tracker on the Character card. Move tracker one slot for every.

subObjectives.description: Human Revival performed by Medical
Cube moved to Betrayal upon Medical's Reveal

ScoringQuirks: Positions on the track which have a star: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 11+. 7 points maximum

objectives.description: 2 points if Microbiologist Escapes
1 point for every Contaminated Character that Escapes
2 points if the X-Secret Escapes

characters.name: Operative
gamePlayQuirks: Has 3 trap tokens that can be used once revealed. 1 token is the real trap, 2 are decoys that do nothing.

objectives.description: 2 points if Evidence does not Escape
2 points if X-Secret does not Escape.
2 points if no Innocent PCs Escape
2 points if no Contaminated Characters Escape
1 point if no Robots Escape

characters.name: Security
gamePlayQuirks: Starts with an integral gun that can not be removed.

objectives.description: 1 point per Down Fugitive, Monster or non-innocent Player PC On Board at Stationfall
1 point per Down Human with Bludgeon or Gun On Board at Stationfall
1 point if Briefcase does not Escape
1 point if Aftifact does not Escape

subObjectives.description: +1 point if both Briefcase + Artifact do not Escape

objectives.description: 1 point for every other Human that Escapes

subObjectives.description: +1 point per NPC with the Officer ability that escapes.

objectives.description: 2 points if Station Chief On Board and Live at Stationfall

characters.name: Stowaway
gamePlayQuirks: Starts off the board. First ever action must be to Step into any Dark Section. Cannot be interacted until then.

objectives.description: 2 points if News (Offsites) ends with X-Secret
2 points if News (Offsites) ends with Evidence
2 points if Stowaway Escapes

subObjectives.description: +3 points if Escape with Evidence and no other Character does.

objectives.description: 1 point if your Secret Identity is not revealed until Stationfall
1 point if Possess X-Secret
2 points if you score Bonus Points
2 points if Live and Colocated with a Bonus Character of yours at Stationfall

characters.name: Telepathic Rat
gamePlayQuirks: Rat is an item, it can be Picked Up, Dropped, Thrown etc.
Cannot possess items or data
Starts contaminated , can be decontaminated normally
Cannot be bribed
Cannot be attacked or ever become down.

objectives.description: 1 point for each Down Human or Robot Colocated with Rat a Stationfall

subObjectives.description: +2 points for each Possessed Kompromat of Colocated Down Characters

objectives.description: 2 points if Rat Colocated with Artifact at Stationfall
2 points if Rat Colocated with Briefcase at Stationfall

characters.name: Troubleshooter
gamePlayQuirks: Starts with a Bludgeon

objectives.description: 2 points if Antimatter is not Armed at Stationfall.
2 points if Project X was never released.
2 points if no Sections are Damaged at Stationfall.
1 point for each Live Robot at Stationfall.
